extendedInfo.description: The eLiquid Recipe Manager allows e-cigarette users to formulate and view recipes to create their own eLiquid mixes for use in their e-cigarette devices.Create/Edit/Delete individual ingredients (Nicotine/Flavors/Fillers)Create/Edit/Delete complete eLiquid recipesBuilt-in Help/FAQ assists in using the application and mixing your own eLiquid for the first timeSupports PG/VG blends in both Nicotine bases and predefined fillersSet Drops Per ML setting globally or per each individual ingredientVoltage/Wattage Calculator for Variable Voltage/Wattage users (Pro version only)Ad Free (Pro version only)The recipe engine has two modes: Ratio and Premixed Filler.  Some users just want to make a recipe that's a ratio of PG and VG (80/20, 50/50, etc), for that you just have to set the preferred ratio without adding any filler ingredients to the recipe.  It supports 100% PG to 100% VG for the ratio.  The engine will calculate your results based on the desired ratio.  Other users create a premixed filler blend or just use straight PG or VG, the recipe engine allows you to add one filler ingredient and utilize it as the primary filler for the recipe.  These were the two most common scenarios asked for by users of the app.  Coming Soon:Send recipe to email recipient (Pro version only)Import/Export recipe data to Google Drive (Pro version only)Add amperage and anticipated battery life calculators (Pro version only)Vaping Information/Media site linksFeatured Suppliers sectionMuch, much more....If you have any questions about how the application works that the Help/FAQ section does not address, feel free to email me at ivisi@composed-chaos.com or on Twitter (@ComposedChaos) prior to leaving a bad review, as some of the reviews lately have been misinformed.  I don't mind a bad review if it's warranted (in those cases, I've earned those bad reviews), but if you just aren't finding what you think the app is supposed to do, ask me first before tarnishing my reputation, please.

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I purchased the pro version after reading the developer\'s \'About\' section in the app.  The app is great at what it does and I wanted to support a developer that shares the same hobbies as me.  The feature that allows you to select a nicotine base that has a varying mix of PG and VG is very handy and missing from another app I tried.
reviews.author: Tobias Rivers

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: By far the best e-liquid calculator on the android market, easy to use and makes creating new recipies a doddle. Also being able to save recipes makes it so much easier to remix your favorite creations.
reviews.author: Jon Key

reviews.title: Excellent but...
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars if you could add water to saved recipes. The quick mix has water but not recipes? Other than that the best app by far. Once this is added I will be upgrading to pro as I already use this app as my only mixing app after try loads of them. Also needs to stop phone sleeping very annoying the screen going black. EDIT. sorted screen going off doing what you said, given 4 stars till update on water.
reviews.author: Bobby Stagg

reviews.title: Great, Simple to use
reviews.comment: I prefer using this to the spreadsheets that others have created because I can assume nic level and pg/vg ratio and just mix. Great to have on the sink and reference as I mix. Would like a means to export to say print or save.  Checking back: still looking for those updates. Been waiting to update to pro.
reviews.author: Tom Baker

reviews.title: Best calc out there
reviews.comment: Very intuitive app. Quick reply from developer - now it does everything I want.
reviews.author: Reggy IP

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: I use a 23% flavor and 60:40 ratio and its perfect. Using any other way to mix your liquid other than this app will not be consistent. Buy Totally Wicked for your flavor concentrates my friends...the best!
reviews.author: Lucas Green

reviews.title: Great app, but..
reviews.comment: It would be nice to be able to change the colors of the ingredients/make folders so that you could find a sweet flavor, brand, or tobacco flavor easier. It would also be nice to have ingredients alphabetized when selecting to create a recipe. Overall very happy with it and I think I\'ll get the pro to pay you for your great app.
reviews.author: Kirby Clark

reviews.title: Great even for inexperienced mixers
reviews.comment: I\'m new to mixing but love the fact that it\'s so simple to use that it\'s a no brainer to figure out.  In addition to the basic recipe calculator that I like it has some other options that as I get more experienced I\'m sure I\'ll love too.  Thanks for the easy to use and useful app!  Also love the built in help section.  I wish more apps had something like that.  Even though the free version seems to very easily meet my needs I\'m off to get the pay version to support the creators efforts and as a small show of thanks.  Hopefully others will also support the creator of this fine app.
reviews.author: Robert H

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Sorry for the previous post. This app is really great and useful.
reviews.author: Khalid S.

reviews.comment: It\'s much better than I first thought. The ratio was counter intuitive at first, but easy when you stop trying to manually enter the fillers
reviews.author: Bill Jack

reviews.title: Quick Recipe
reviews.comment: It does not recalculate after I make changes in the quick recipe, this could lead to bad mixtures.
reviews.author: Nelson Buttman

reviews.title: Missing something critical
reviews.comment: Cannot use because there is no option for flavoring zero pg and vg ratio...
reviews.author: Mark Welch

reviews.title: Solid app.
reviews.comment: This is a great app! If you have problems with it and you are on 4.3, uninstall and reinstall and it should work perfect. I\'m going to purchase the pro version now.
reviews.author: Shane D.

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: This is an app that every home mixer needs to have.
reviews.author: ray dix

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Simple to use & very handy. If you DIY your own juices, this is a must have! Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Robert Bihari

reviews.title: Enjoying this thus far:
reviews.comment: It would be helpful--at least for me--to be able to just use a base of a certain amount that\'s diluted by the flavoring. As in, if you don\'t fill in the target strength it will calculate it.
reviews.author: Michael Johnson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: 5 stars for an awesome app with breakin 2 reference...
reviews.author: Jerry Starett

reviews.title: Crap app
reviews.comment: Won\'t let users add pg and vg.
reviews.author: Neofelis Neo

reviews.title: Was good, but
reviews.comment: The daily updates are annoying. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: B Coleman

reviews.title: Works for basic recipes
reviews.comment: Would be nice to be able to designate 50/50 nicotine bases, or use decimals for flavorings.  Unless I just missed that somewhere.
reviews.author: A Google User
